course_description: The purpose of the course is to introduce graduate students in Islamic Civilizations Studies, Religion, Philosophy, and related fields to the theologies ofIslamic mysticism, concentrating on metaphysics and epistemology.
sections: Class Nbr: 2320, Section #: 1, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: Th 2:30-5:15p, Instructor: V. Cornell, Status: Open
